biotools.summary: permGWAS is an open source software tool written in python to efficiently perform genome-wide association studies (GWAS) with permutation-based thresholds. permGWAS provides support for multiple CPUs as well as for GPUs.

bioschemas.name: permGWAS
bioschemas.summary: permGWAS is an open source software tool written in python to efficiently perform genome-wide association studies (GWAS) with permutation-based thresholds. permGWAS provides support for multiple CPUs as well as for GPUs.
